choose.when: SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.*, FN_DISTANCE(#{latitude}, #{longitude}, LOCATION_LAT, LOCATION_LNG) AS DISTANCE FROM STORE_INFO S) WHERE STORE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY DISTANCE
choose.otherwise: SELECT * FROM (SELECT S.*, FN_DISTANCE(#{latitude}, #{longitude}, LOCATION_LAT, LOCATION_LNG) AS DISTANCE FROM STORE_INFO S) WHERE TYPE=#{type} AND STORE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY DISTANCE
